column4: (by the way, if there was one thing that would make me use ubuntu's terminal over winxp's cmd, it would be CTRL+Z)
is it safe to install something via apt-get while a package manager is downloading something, and would it appear in the pckage manager? Basically do all package managers use the same database
but if i close the package manager and do the apt-get would opening the package manager show it as installed and let me do the regular stuff with it?
pygame does not exist as a packge, compile it
umm this tutorial says it does
um, i'm using apt-get. is that a problem
guess i'll continue using it, then ;)
the package name is wrong, it is python-pygame, not just pygame
I wish people would not send messages like that to the channel so that the text would scroll slower and everyone could find what they are looking for in the channel
the best way to assign a keyboard shortcut for opening the terminal?
